## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards

- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Inline documentation (docblocks) added/updated

### Database & Migrations
- [ ] Database migrations are reversible (down method implemented)
- [ ] Seeders updated (if needed)
- [ ] No direct database changes without migrations

### Dependencies
- [ ] New dependencies added to composer.json/package.json
- [ ] Dependencies are necessary and justified
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities in new dependencies

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) in code
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] CSRF protection considered
- [ ] SQL injection prevention considered
- [ ] XSS prevention considered
